duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting the Store Manager with oversight of the Station Store operations including hiring, supervising, and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintaining high standards and providing fast and friendly service to customers, setting an example and displaying a sense of urgency, patience, and leadership.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent plus 6 months to 1 year of retail and management work experience preferred.
Knowledge of basic business and customer service principles including planning and organizing, resource management, and leadership skills.
